=A0=A0=A0=A0
All,

I had an experience of using Heritrix v 3.1.0. I used to=
 process Arc files and load the HTML records into a Database.

Nowadays, I =
am working on v 3.2.0 and Heritrix is generating warc files. 

However, I c=
ould not figure out a way to read the contents of WARC file and store its r=
ecords into a Database based on what I know how it works with v 3.1.0.

I a=
m unable to find the below classes in heritrix-commons-3.2.0.jar

	1. WARCR=
eaderFactory
	2. WARCReader
	3. WARCHeader
	4. etc..

Note: The package str=
ucture org.archive.io.* of v 3.1.0 is totally different to v 3.2.0

So can =
somebody please advise, how I can build a parser with the latest Heritrix r=
elease and send me a sample program?

Thanks,
Ravi Itha
